## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                       | Type                                | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `height`  | `height`  | Height                            | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `rows`    | `rows`    | Number of rows (for text variant) | `number`                            | `1`         |
| `variant` | `variant` | Visual variant                    | `"circle" \| "rectangle" \| "text"` | `'text'`    |
| `width`   | `width`   | Width                             | `string`                            | `undefined` |
